name: Rabbit Flick (GGJ 2023)
description:
This is the Global Game Jam 2023 version of the game - it will never be updated! You can play the updated version here.

HOW TO PLAY

Click (and maybe drag) to flick the rabbits!

CREDITS

  • Bunny artist and animator: Adam Canto
  • Environment and assorted artists: Steve Kranjac, Liv
  • Programmers: Kieran Clarke, Bilal Akil
  • Sound effects: Morgan Ainsley

Royalty free music thanks to: https://discord.com/channels/1071008461736902658/1071008462370246718/10716756823...
